snippet: After last week’s loss to Oakland, some 49ers fans, spoiled by growing up with Joe Montana and Steve Young, were filmed burning their Colin Kaepernick jerseys in protest.
lead_paragraph: After last week’s loss to Oakland, some 49ers fans, spoiled by growing up with Joe Montana and Steve Young, were filmed burning their Colin Kaepernick jerseys in protest.

headline.main: San Francisco 49ers at Seattle Seahawks Preview
